name: @blockmason/link-workshop-tor-react
description: React implementation of the Link stamp collector demo app

scripts.documentation: rm -fR docs; find src -type f -name index.js | xargs jsdoc --destination ./docs --package ./package.json --readme ./README.md
scripts.test: find src -type f -name spec.js | NODE_ENV=test xargs nyc --silent --check-coverage --lines 100 --per-file mocha --require @babel/register
